price: ߒ ߕߊ߫ ߜߊ߬ߟߏ߬ ߓߍ߫ ߞߟߋ߫߹ ߥߟߊߞߏ߫ ߒ ߕߎ߲߬ ߞߣߊ߫ ߞߊ߬ߘߌ߬ߛߊ߬ ߘߐߡߌ߬ߣߊ߬ ߕߋߙߌ߫ ߘߌ߫
arabic: يَٰوَيۡلَتَىٰ لَيۡتَنِي لَمۡ أَتَّخِذۡ فُلَانًا خَلِيلٗا

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: yāwaylatā laytanī lam attakhidh fulānan khalīlan
